bill_title: Recognizing and celebrating the Pierre Governors football team.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing and celebrating the Pierre Governors football team. WHEREAS, on November 10, 2023, the Pierre Governors football team earned their seventh consecutive Class 11AA State Championship with a final score of 35-17; and WHEREAS, the Pierre Governors were expertly led by their coach Steve Steele, and assistant coaches Daniel Maciejczak, Scott Neu, Ryan Royer, Joshua Schleusner, Adam Spoehr, and Matt Thorson; and WHEREAS, the Pierre Governors became the first high school football team in South Dakota history to win seven consecutive football championships: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature recognizes and celebrates the 2023 state championship victory of the Pierre Governors football team.
